title: [管理|娱乐|综合]AnimatedExplosions——会飞的爆炸物
author: LittleSkep

replies.author: asjkdaskljda
replies.txt_content:
标题: [管理|娱乐|综合]AnimatedExplosions——会飞的爆炸物 本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-16 21:25 编辑 

会飞的爆炸物
顾名思义，当TNTorCreeper等爆炸后不是将爆炸物给炸消失，而是将爆炸物弄飞至天上！
等于将其飞入天上，并且停留。
图片：


很适合于战争服，小游戏和派系战争！
但是前提开启爆炸！
作者原话:
====== Minecraft plugin version is currently 1.8 ============ Works with 1.8 - 1.8.8 ======DescriptionWhen an explosion occurs on your server, instead of having the blocks disappear they will go flying everywhere!PurposeThis plugin can be used on server ranging from Survival/Factions to Minigames and everything in between. I created this plugin because I think the default explosion in Minecraft is a little on the plain side, and quite frankly boring. Not to mention how every explosion looks alike and have nothing to make itself unique.在哪里下载？上面啊！求人气，求金粒勒！@joe1160
